name: Dirt Wheels Racing
description:
It’s time to face the dirt and burn out fuel of your car! Drive through the muddy plains, contest with other racers and win the ride! Feel like a real off-road driver with Dirt Wheels Racing!
The crowd is roaring – the audience is waiting for the show! Join the racing and become a real offroad racer! Ride across the ground trek, earn points and collect awards! Drift through the dirt, avoid crashes and be a winner!

Features:
-Mind-blowing special Powerful engine sounds
-Top speed realistic feel with amazing control
-Legendary super racing cars
-Rush fast rally on racing tracks
-Ready to Start race to meet your racing rivals
-Super HD graphics
